Shop Well-Received, our collection of editor-approved holiday gift guides, here. When it comes to coveted pieces for the movement- and comfort-obsessed, Lululemon is the ultimate one-stop shop. From the brand’s signature ultra-soft leggings to wear-everywhere hoodies we’d happily live in, it’s no surprise the activewear haven is a reader favorite year-round — and a go-to destination for all things holiday gifting, with options for every budget.Lululemon’s gift shop open for business, so we suggest shopping ASAP — only orders placed by December 20 will arrive by Christmas Eve. While you’re at it, why not treat yourself to something, too? From stylish accessories to splurge-worthy outerwear, ahead is an all-star guide to Lululemon’s best styles combining form and function. And honestly, what are the holidays without a full day of couch rotting in the brand’s Softstreme fabric? DashDividers_1_500x100 Best Lululemon Bag Gifts Lululemon’s bags cover every activity and occasion, making them perfect for gifting. Think festive updates to the cult-favorite Everywhere Belt Bag (hello, fleece and iridescent finishes) alongside winter-white bucket bags and plush totes — all ready to wrap up for the season. DashDividers_1_500x100 Best Lululemon Outerwear Gifts Quality outerwear is a gifting win, and Lululemon’s lineup delivers. From trendy puffer jackets and vests to vibrant, jewel-toned Define Jackets, these styles are perfect for layering — and for spoiling someone who’s been extra good this year. DashDividers_1_500x100 Best Lululemon Accessories Gifts Shopping on a budget? Lululemon’s under-$100 gifts have you covered via these accessory gift guides for her and for him. From cozy cashmere, warm merino wool, and plush fleece to sparkling festive water bottles, the answer to: “Wait, they make that too?” is a resounding “Yes!” DashDividers_1_500x100 Best Lululemon Leggings Gifts Treat yourself or your on-the-go bestie to a sure-to-delight surprise: Lululemon leggings. With fan favorites like Align and Wunder Train dropping in dazzling new colors, there’s a perfect pick for everyone on your list. DashDividers_1_500x100 Best Lululemon Gifts For Men Don’t forget the fellas! All linked products are independently selected by our editors. If you purchase any of these products, we may earn a commission.

Photo: Courtesy of Lululemon.

This holiday season, we’ve found the gifts that feel great to get and even better to give. Shop Well-Received, our collection of editor-approved holiday gift guides, here.

When it comes to coveted pieces for the movement- and comfort-obsessed, Lululemon is the ultimate one-stop shop. From the brand's signature ultra-soft leggings to wear-everywhere hoodies we’d happily live in, it's no surprise the activewear haven is a reader favorite year-round — and a go-to destination for all things holiday gifting, with options for every budget.

Lululemon’s gift shop open for business, so we suggest shopping ASAP — only orders placed by December 20 will arrive by Christmas Eve. While you're at it, why not treat yourself to something, too? From stylish accessories to splurge-worthy outerwear, ahead is an all-star guide to Lululemon's best styles combining form and function.

AdvertisementADVERTISEMENT

Best Lululemon Apparel Gifts

From breezy joggers to casual dresses, Lululemon's got options for way more than breaking a sweat in. And honestly, what are the holidays without a full day of couch rotting in the brand’s Softstreme fabric?

Best Lululemon Bag Gifts

Lululemon’s bags cover every activity and occasion, making them perfect for gifting. Think festive updates to the cult-favorite Everywhere Belt Bag (hello, fleece and iridescent finishes) alongside winter-white bucket bags and plush totes — all ready to wrap up for the season.

Best Lululemon Outerwear Gifts

Quality outerwear is a gifting win, and Lululemon’s lineup delivers. From trendy puffer jackets and vests to vibrant, jewel-toned Define Jackets, these styles are perfect for layering — and for spoiling someone who’s been extra good this year.

Best Lululemon Accessories Gifts

Shopping on a budget? Lululemon’s under-$100 gifts have you covered via these accessory gift guides for her and for him. From cozy cashmere, warm merino wool, and plush fleece to sparkling festive water bottles, the answer to: “Wait, they make that too?” is a resounding "Yes!"

Best Lululemon Leggings Gifts

Treat yourself or your on-the-go bestie to a sure-to-delight surprise: Lululemon leggings. With fan favorites like Align and Wunder Train dropping in dazzling new colors, there's a perfect pick for everyone on your list.

Best Lululemon Gifts For Men

Don’t forget the fellas! Top-rated joggers and slides make for the ultimate off-duty staples, while flannel button-downs and vests are winter-adventure-ready.
